verbs.description: < p > Kim Kardashian West [V: is] responding to those who say Donald Trump used her as a political pawn in securing the commutation of Alice Marie Johnson , the 63-year - old first - time nonviolent drug offender who in 1996 was given a life sentence without parole.</p >
